languages.text: Самозван{mf|ец|ка} с восторгом принял{mf||а} предложение. Теперь он{mf||а} посещает светские рауты и прочие официозные мероприятия, вдохновляя власти планет "личными" визитами Вольного Торговца.
The impostor was overjoyed to accept the offer. Now {mf|he|she} attends social gatherings and other formal events, inspiring the planet's officials with "personal" visits from the Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Самозван{mf|ец|ка} с восторгом принял{mf||а} предложение. Теперь он{mf||а} посещает светские рауты и прочие официозные мероприятия, вдохновляя власти планет "личными" визитами Вольного Торговца.

languages.text: L'imposteur accepte avec joie la proposition qui lui est faite. Désormais, {mf|il|elle} assiste aux réunions et autres événements officiels, galvanisant la loyauté des représentants planétaires flattés que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} les honore « personnellement » de son auguste présence.
languages.original_text: The impostor was overjoyed to accept the offer. Now {mf|he|she} attends social gatherings and other formal events, inspiring the planet's officials with "personal" visits from the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: L'imposteur accepte avec joie la proposition qui lui est faite. Désormais, {mf|il|elle} assiste aux réunions et autres événements officiels, galvanisant la loyauté des représentants planétaires flattés que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} les honore « personnellement » de son auguste présence.

languages.text: 偽者は大喜びでその申し出を受け入れた。今や{mf|彼|彼女}は社交界やその他の公式行事に出席し、自由開拓者の「個人的な」訪問で惑星の役人たちを喜ばせている。
languages.original_text: The impostor was overjoyed to accept the offer. Now {mf|he|she} attends social gatherings and other formal events, inspiring the planet's officials with "personal" visits from the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 偽者は大喜びでその申し出を受け入れた。今や{mf|彼|彼女}は社交界やその他の公式行事に出席し、自由開拓者の「個人的な」訪問で惑星の役人たちを喜ばせている。

languages.text: 这个提议让冒牌货欣喜若狂。如今，{mf|她|她}会以行商浪人的身份参加各种社交聚会与正式活动，“亲自”访问各个行星，鼓励当地官员。
languages.original_text: The impostor was overjoyed to accept the offer. Now {mf|he|she} attends social gatherings and other formal events, inspiring the planet's officials with "personal" visits from the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 这个提议让冒牌货欣喜若狂。如今，{mf|她|她}会以行商浪人的身份参加各种社交聚会与正式活动，“亲自”访问各个行星，鼓励当地官员。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} impostor{mf||a} aceptó la oferta con mucho gusto. Ahora asiste a encuentros sociales y otras ocasiones formales impresionando a los diferentes cargos del planeta con la visita «personal» de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: The impostor was overjoyed to accept the offer. Now {mf|he|she} attends social gatherings and other formal events, inspiring the planet's officials with "personal" visits from the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} impostor{mf||a} aceptó la oferta con mucho gusto. Ahora asiste a encuentros sociales y otras ocasiones formales impresionando a los diferentes cargos del planeta con la visita «personal» de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: {mf|Der Hochstapler|Die Hochstaplerin} nahm das Angebot überglücklich an. Nun besucht {mf|er|sie} gesellschaftliche Ereignisse und andere formelle Anlässe und inspiriert die Beamten des Planeten durch "persönliche" Besuche {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}.
languages.original_text: The impostor was overjoyed to accept the offer. Now {mf|he|she} attends social gatherings and other formal events, inspiring the planet's officials with "personal" visits from the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: Sahtekâr, sunulan teklifi kabul ederken sevinçten havalara uçtu. Artık davetlerle diğer resmî etkinliklere o katılıyor ve gezegenin yetkililerini Hür Tacir'in "şahsi" ziyaretiyle motive ediyor.
languages.original_text: The impostor was overjoyed to accept the offer. Now {mf|he|she} attends social gatherings and other formal events, inspiring the planet's officials with "personal" visits from the Rogue Trader.
